a_active_users.label: Number of Active Users
a_active_users.description: Gets the maximum total_active_users from the GitHub Copilot API.

a_ai_adoption_rate.label: AI Adoption Rate
a_ai_adoption_rate.description: The average of the total accepted divided by suggested lines from the GitHub Copilot API.

a_ai_usage.label: AI Usage
a_ai_usage.description: Sums the total_chats from the GitHub Copilot API.

a_code_suggestions.label: Code Lines Suggested by Copilot
a_code_suggestions.description: Sums the total_code_lines_suggested from the GitHub Copilot API.

a_code_accepted.label: Code Lines Accepted from Copilot
a_code_accepted.description: Sums the total_code_lines_accepted from the GitHub Copilot API.

s_merged_prs.label: Number of Merged PRs
s_merged_prs.description: Represents the total number of merged pull requests from BitBucket.

s_pr_review_time.label: Avg PR Review Time (Mins)
s_pr_review_time.description: Measures the average time taken to review pull requests (in minutes) from BitBucket.

s_story_points.label: Story Points (Squad Level)
s_story_points.description: Tracks the total story points completed per Project.

q_code_smells.label: Code Quality / Code Smells
q_code_smells.description: Total number of Code Smells identified via SonarQube for the given month

q_coverage.label: Unit Test Coverage
q_coverage.description: Represents the latest percentage of code covered by unit tests via SonarQube for the given month.

q_bugs.label: Bugs
q_bugs.description: Total number of Bugs identified via SonarQube for the given month

q_vulnerabilities.label: Vulnerabilities
q_vulnerabilities.description: Total number of Vulnerabilities identified via SonarQube for the given month

e_user_satisfaction.label: User Satisfaction
e_user_satisfaction.description: Measures the percentage of users satisfied with the platform.

e_adoption.label: Adoption & Frequency
e_adoption.description: Tracks the frequency and adoption rate of the platform's features.

e_productivity.label: Productivity, Quality & Benefits Sentiments
e_productivity.description: Represents user sentiments regarding productivity, quality, and benefits.

e_use_cases.label: Use Cases
e_use_cases.description: Counts the number of distinct use cases implemented by users.

d_deployment_frequency.label: Deployment Frequency
d_deployment_frequency.description: The total number of pipeline runs for the selected projects.
